> +++ b/src/pkg/container/heap/heap.**go
> @@ -3,7 +3,13 @@
>  // license that can be found in the LICENSE file.
>
>  // Package heap provides heap operations for any type that implements
> -// heap.Interface.
> +// heap.Interface. A heap is a tree with the property that each node is
> the
> +// highest-valued node in its subtree.
> +//
> +// A heap is a common represention for a priority queue. A heap is
> +// implemented with the (negative) priority as the ordering for the Less
> +// method, so Push adds items while Pop removes the highest-priority item
> +// from the queue.
>  //
>  package heap
>
>
